content: पुंड्रः [पुंड्-भेदने रक] {@--1@} A kind of sugar cane (red-variety). {@--2@} A lotus in general. {@--3@} A white lotus. {@--4@} A mark or line (on the forehead) made with sandal &c., sectarial mark. {@--5@} A worm. {@--6@} The {%Atimukta%} creeper. --ड्राः <ab>pl.</ab> N of a country and its inhabitants.
